title: Ticket #1748: Convert primary HFS structure from array to tree
description:
Converts HFS to tree based structure for better readability and scaling performance for systems with large number of groups.

Hfs patch adds:

1) tree based structure 2) fix for floating point precision problems 3) Reworked logic for roundoff stages 4) Moved interior node submissions to new leaf on each interior node
